23.ara-name: كتاب الجهاد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Sa’id Al Khudri : "During the year of the conquest, when the Prophet (ﷺ) reached Marr Zahran, he told us that we would meet the enemy. So he ordered us to break the fast, and we [all] broke our fast." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih, and there is something on this topic from Ibn 'Umar

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْفِطْرِ عِنْدَ الْقِتَالِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Breaking Fast At The Time Of Fighting
